pages.text: Water spells can be found in Ocean Ruins or from fishing

pages.title: Aqua Shield
pages.text: Grants the user a shield from direct mob damage for 15 seconds $(li)Mana Cost: 50

pages.title: Freeze
pages.text: Shoots a chunk of snow that freezes and slows the target $(li)Mana Cost: 10

pages.title: Drown
pages.text: Places water on the target's head $(li)Mana Cost: 30 $(li)Range: 10

pages.title: Mend
pages.text: Heals the user for 4 hearts and clear all negative effects $(li)Mana Cost: 40
